holidays.title: Baby Massage Day
holidays.description: Let us raise awareness about the health benefits of massages for babies and try to promote this healthy habit as much as possible.

holidays.title: Day of Romas
holidays.description: Let's help create a future where there is no discrimination due to ethnicity and language.

holidays.title: Draw a Bird Day
holidays.description: On Draw a Bird Day, let's get ready to become artists and start drawing!

holidays.title: International Feng Shui Awareness Day
holidays.description: Find out how the right flow of chi can bring good results to your life.

holidays.title: International Kids Yoga Day
holidays.description: Yoga for five minutes daily can improve your kids' well-being and mental health.

holidays.title: International Pageant Day
holidays.description: Pageants are loved and hated almost in equal measure but today we celebrate beauty and brains.

holidays.title: International Romani Day
holidays.description: Celebrate rich Romani culture, heritage, and traditions, and speak up for the rights of the Roma!

holidays.title: International Romani Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the day that honors the Romani people and culture.

holidays.title: National All is Ours Day
holidays.description: Paris or relaxing in your favorite spot in the garden, there’s beauty in everything!

holidays.title: National Dog Fighting Awareness Day
holidays.description: Learn how to look for signs that a dog is being forced to fight.

holidays.title: National Zoo Lovers Day
holidays.description: Pack your bags and get your camera ready, we’re going to the zoo!

holidays.title: Pygmy Hippo Day
holidays.description: Let us bring awareness about the precarious situation of pygmy hippos and try to help.

holidays.title: Step Into the Spotlight Day
holidays.description: Bring out your finest suit and enjoy this day by stepping out looking really sharp!

holidays.title: Trading Cards for Grown-ups Day
holidays.description: Start collecting your favorite trading cards with no guilt as we celebrate this fun day.

holidays.title: Jonghyun’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented K-pop musician left us too soon but he’ll always be remembered by his fans.

holidays.title: Matty Healy’s Birthday
holidays.description: The self-assured, talented, and brilliant lyricist of The 1975 is here to break stereotypes.

holidays.title: Silas Timberlake’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this bubbly child of superstar celebrities, the world is at his feet.

holidays.title: Skai Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Success is in the queue for this young actress who keeps making headway in Hollywood.
